_source.name: Angel's Mercy
_source.mechanics: You gain 7 life.
_source.description: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."

_source.name: Goldnight Redeemer
_source.mechanics: FlyingWhen Goldnight Redeemer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each other creature you control.
_source.description: The Host sings of Avacyn's return without a single verse about its own suffering.

_source.name: Midnight Duelist
_source.mechanics: Protection from Vampires
_source.description: Avacyn's return did not rid him of his desire for revenge.

_source.name: Nearheath Pilgrim
_source.mechanics: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)As long as Nearheath Pilgrim is paired with another creature, both creatures have lifelink.

_source.name: Defy Death
_source.mechanics: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it's an Angel, put two +1/+1 counters on it.
_source.description: Gisela cornered the murderous demon among the graves of the dead villagers. "A fitting end," she murmured as she raised her sword.

_source.name: Farbog Explorer
_source.mechanics: Swampwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
_source.description: "I'd slog through a thousand swamps to help one soul find rest."

_source.name: Leap of Faith
_source.mechanics: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to that creature this turn.
_source.description: The finest maneuvers take place in three dimensions.

_source.name: Moonlight Geist
_source.mechanics: Flying{3}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Moonlight Geist this turn.
_source.description: Wails and whispers are the only weapons she has left.

_source.name: Moorland Inquisitor
_source.mechanics: {2}{W}: Moorland Inquisitor gains first strike until end of turn.
_source.description: Inquisitors are taught scripture, philosophy, and the fine art of sharpening an axe.

_source.name: Angel of Jubilation
_source.mechanics: FlyingOther nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1.Players can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.
_source.description: "Though Innistrad is not cleansed of evil, we finally have cause to rejoice."

_source.name: Archangel
_source.mechanics: Flying, vigilance
_source.description: The sky rang with the cries of armored seraphs, and the darkness made a tactical retreat.

_source.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
_source.mechanics: Flying, vigilanceAvacyn, Angel of Hope and other permanents you control are indestructible.
_source.description: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

_source.name: Angel of Glory's Rise
_source.mechanics: FlyingWhen Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
_source.description: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

_source.name: Archangel
_source.mechanics: Flying, vigilance
_source.description: The sky rang with the cries of armored seraphs, and the darkness made a tactical retreat.

_source.name: Avacyn, Angel of Hope
_source.mechanics: Flying, vigilanceAvacyn, Angel of Hope and other permanents you control are indestructible.
_source.description: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

_source.name: Builder's Blessing
_source.mechanics: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
_source.description: "Mix the mortar with holy wards, or blood will run in the streets."—Vadvar, Thraben stonewright

_source.name: Cathars' Crusade
_source.mechanics: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
_source.description: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.

_source.name: Commander's Authority
_source.mechanics: Enchant creatureEnchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 1/1 white Human creature token onto the battlefield."
_source.description: "Wear her symbol with honor, a sign of faith upheld and honest deeds bravely done."

_source.name: Cursebreak
_source.mechanics: Destroy target enchantment. You gain 2 life.
_source.description: No longer the village pariah. No longer taunted and shamed. Sigrun was finally free.

_source.name: Angel of Glory's Rise
_source.mechanics: FlyingWhen Angel of Glory's Rise enters the battlefield, exile all Zombies, then return all Human creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
_source.description: "Justice isn't done until undeath is undone."

_source.name: Banishing Stroke
_source.mechanics: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

_source.name: Builder's Blessing
_source.mechanics: Untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
_source.description: "Mix the mortar with holy wards, or blood will run in the streets."—Vadvar, Thraben stonewright

_source.name: Angel of Jubilation
_source.mechanics: FlyingOther nonblack creatures you control get +1/+1.Players can't pay life or sacrifice creatures to cast spells or activate abilities.
_source.description: "Though Innistrad is not cleansed of evil, we finally have cause to rejoice."

_source.name: Angelic Wall
_source.mechanics: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
_source.description: "The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

_source.name: Banishing Stroke
_source.mechanics: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

_source.name: Call to Serve
_source.mechanics: Enchant nonblack creatureEnchanted creature gets +1/+2, has flying, and is an Angel in addition to its other types.
_source.description: Grace is a gift, never a reward.

_source.name: Defang
_source.mechanics: Enchant creaturePrevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
_source.description: Once vampires are disarmed, they're given wooden swords and forced to assist in the training of Midnight Duelists.

_source.name: Devout Chaplain
_source.mechanics: {T}, Tap two untapped Humans you control: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
_source.description: "By Avacyn's decree, we shall cleanse these relics of their demonic past."

_source.name: Divine Deflection
_source.mechanics: Prevent the next X damage that would be dealt to you and/or permanents you control this turn. If damage is prevented this way, Divine Deflection deals that much damage to target creature or player.

_source.name: Emancipation Angel
_source.mechanics: FlyingWhen Emancipation Angel enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
_source.description: "You have done your best. I give you leave to rest."

_source.name: Entreat the Angels
_source.mechanics: Put X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying onto the battlefield.Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

_source.name: Herald of War
_source.mechanics: FlyingWhenever Herald of War attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.Angel spells and Human spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each +1/+1 counter on Herald of War.

_source.name: Midvast Protector
_source.mechanics: When Midvast Protector enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
_source.description: "I cultivated my faith in Avacyn despite meager returns. Now my faith is repaid."

_source.name: Cathedral Sanctifier
_source.mechanics: When Cathedral Sanctifier enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
_source.description: "Evil will soon be vanquished. What Innistrad most needs now is healing."

_source.name: Cloudshift
_source.mechanics: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
_source.description: "Even storm clouds bow to worship Avacyn."—Elder Rimheit

_source.name: Goldnight Commander
_source.mechanics: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
_source.description: "One faith, but many hands in victory."

_source.name: Holy Justiciar
_source.mechanics: {2}{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. If that creature is a Zombie, exile it.
_source.description: Her eyes see through the rotting flesh and glimpse a soul in agony, begging for the Blessed Sleep.

_source.name: Angel's Mercy
_source.mechanics: You gain 7 life.
_source.description: "I understand your fears. I pity your doubts. I absolve you of both."

_source.name: Angelic Wall
_source.mechanics: Defender, flying (This creature can't attack, and it can block creatures with flying.)
_source.description: "The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager
